chapters.title: Chapter 23: Foxheads
chapters.info: Lord Conail Northan, p. 365—High Seat of House Northan. He is tall and lean, has bony arms, an engaging grin, merry brown eyes, and an eagle's beak of a nose. He is not much older than sixteen. He thinks Arymilla is incompetant, and pledged the support of his House to Elayne. He was invited to the opera Elayne had performed in the Palace.
